metadata.title: CVE-2017-7479 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
OpenVPN versions before 2.3.15 and before 2.4.2 are vulnerable to reachableassertion when packet-ID counter rolls over resulting into Denial ofService of server by authenticated attacker.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7479` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openvpn - 2.3.10-1ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openvpn package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.10-1ubuntu2.1').
